meanings.definition: The quality or state of being masterly.
meanings.sent1: Her masterliness in painting was evident in every stroke of the brush.
meanings.sent2: His masterliness in chess allowed him to win every game effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed its masterliness in catching the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The masterliness of the conductor was evident as the orchestra played in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The chef's masterliness in creating delicious dishes made him famous worldwide.

meanings.definition: The skill or ability of a master.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter's masterliness in woodworking was admired by all.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated her masterliness in solving complex equations quickly.
meanings.sent3: The magician's masterliness in card tricks left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: His masterliness in negotiation helped him secure the best deal for his company.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's masterliness in multiple sports made him a versatile player.
